title: studio for students
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


7th and last floor (elevator). This studio is ideal for students. Studio of 11 m2 : kitchinette and shower, full furnished (dishes, laundry, etc...), bed and sofa bed.  The toilet are private, but is right outside the door. There is a two months deposit that will be returned when you move out 480 euros (Price : 480 per month, all included except electricity (about €20 per month).
